txt.en: 'Y-y-you want advice? From ME? Well then, p-p-perhaps I can give a greenhorn a bit of instruction on how to make it.\n\nAlways stand up straight. If you're holding a spear, make sure the pointy end ain't aimed at the other actors. Wash your costume once a week, even if you don't think it needs it. Try to be serious, but not too serious; you're supposed to be the funny one, if you catch my meaning.'
Do you have any advice for me?
